title: Why retirement realities are changing for future generations
text: Retirement realities are changing for future generations. A Wells Fargo study reveals today's retirees are the last demographic to experience their golden years shaped by forces of the prior century. The survey notes 86% of today's U.S. retirees are living primarily off their social security or pension, and younger generations are taking notice. Chad Parks, Founder and CEO of Ubiquity Retirement, joins with Yahoo Finance's Zack Guzman and Kristin Myers, along with The Brewer Group CEO and Former NFL Player Jack Brewer, to discuss.
